#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	int t,A[10009],diff,col,bag,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	int N,M;
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&N,&M);
		col=0;bag=N;
		int minX=N;
		int minY=0;
		for(i=0;i<M;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&A[i]);
			if(i>=1)
			{
				diff=A[i]-A[i-1];
				if(diff!=0)
				{
					col+=diff;
					bag-=diff;
				}
				else col-=1;
				if(minX>bag)minX=bag;
				if(minY>col)minY=col;
			}
		}
		if(minX+minY-1>=0)
		printf("%d\n",-1*minY+1);

	else
		printf("%d\n",-1);
	}


	return 0;
}
